A template function to be used as a root function for parser map.
The function scans a folder for delimited files based on a file name pattern, parses the files and generates a stream of records.

Comment.value: the folder to scan for files
the folder to scan for files in debug mode
a Java regualr expression of file names to be parsed
a character to be used as a separator between records
a character to be used as a separator between fields
a character to be used to enclose fields
a character to be used as a separator between records
a character to be used as a separator between fields
a character to be used to enclose fields

when the input is null return the value entered, else return the input itself
Strip whitespace (or other characters) from the beginning of a string

Comment.value: The input string

Desc.value: This function will pad the i_pad_string to i_str according to i_pad_length

Comment.value: The input string
The i_pad_string may be truncated if the required number of padding characters can't be evenly divided by the pad_string's length
If the value of i_pad_length is negative, less than, or equal to the length of the input string, no padding takes place.
Optional argument i_pad_type can be STR_PAD_RIGHT, STR_PAD_LEFT, or STR_PAD_BOTH. If pad_type is not specified it is assumed to be STR_PAD_RIGHT
